svg.title: Players want to define their own virtual worlds, but they can't because making their own virtual worlds is hard.
svg.desc:
#title: Players want to define their own virtual worlds, but they can't because making their own virtual worlds is hard. #fontSize: 8 #spacing: 12 #padding: 3
[V-Sekai| Players want to define the virtual worlds. | V-Sekai https://v-sekai.org/ | Players can't make their own virtual worlds because it is hard.]
[<table> Become avatars] -> [<table> Collaborate and create| Estimate | ?W] [Collaborate and create] -> [Godot world live creation ] [Collaborate and create] -> [Place prexisting blocks with blockmeshing ] [<table> Collaborate and create ]-> [<table> Create Godot world creation tools ] [<table> Collaborate and create ]-> [Place scenes ] [<table> Collaborate and create ]-> [Construct layers collaboratively ] [<table> Collaborate and create ]-> [Painting ] [<table> Collaborate and create ]-> [<table> Create Godot world creation tools] [<table> Create Godot world creation tools ] -> [3D models with CASSIE ]
[3D models with CASSIE ]-> [make cassie commercial remixable]
[<table> Create Godot world creation tools ] -> [In-editor model with PLY ] [<table> Create Godot world creation tools ] -> [Painting with MaterialX ]
[V-Sekai] ->[ Engine usability] [V-Sekai] -> [<table> Good graphics] [<table> Good graphics ] -> [Good lighting ] [<table> Good graphics ] -> [VFX (Particles, shaders, Sky)] [V-Sekai]-> [Advanced avatar (shader, IK, animations)] [V-Sekai]-> [Imported physics ] [V-Sekai]-> [Skeleton modifications ] [<table> platform host Uro Infrastructure]->[<table> Become avatars] [<table> Become avatars] -> [Vocal communicate] [<table> Become avatars] -> [Motion communicate] [<table> Become avatars] -> [Dance]
[<table> Become avatars] -> [Godot speech comms system] [<table> Become avatars] -> [Virtual reality 6 degree of freedom tracking ]
[<table> Become avatars]->[<table> Following ] [<table> Following] -> [Double-sided friending. ] [<table> Following] -> [Discover new friends. ]
[<table> Become avatars] -> [Locomotion (flat)] [<table> Become avatars] -> [Virtual reality motion movement]
[<table> Become avatars]->[<table> Interactions ] [<table> Interactions ]-> [Wasgo Scripting ] [<table> Interactions ]-> [In-game menus ] [<table> Interactions ]-> [Video player ]
[<table> Interactions]->[Vehicles ] [<table> Interactions]->[Pickups] [<table> Interactions]->[Buttons]
[<table> Interactions]->[<table> Avatar switch ] [<table> Interactions]->[World portals ] [<table> Interactions]->[Server switch ]
[<table> Interactions]->[<table> Player interactions ] [<table> Player interactions] -> [Camera ] [<table> Player interactions] -> [Bow and arrow ] [<table> Player interactions] -> [Mirror ]
[V-Sekai]->[<table> platform host Uro Infrastructure] [<table> platform host Uro Infrastructure] -> [ Federation list ] [<table> platform host Uro Infrastructure] -> [ Delegated Identity ]
[<table> platform host Uro Infrastructure ]->[<table> Content] [<table> Content ]-> [Refuse to attest content because scripting is untrusted ]
[<table> platform host Uro Infrastructure]->[<table> Deployment kit ]
[V-Sekai] -> [<table> Upgrade PLY to Godot Engine| Estimate | 1W]
[V-Sekai] -> [<table> Launch uro using Elixir Desktop| Estimate | 1W]
[V-Sekai] -> [<table> Make TrueNas Scale run V-Sekai mirror | Estimate | 1W]
[<table> Become avatars] -> [How do we animate the character? VRM1 rig] [<table> Become avatars] -> [How do we retarget to the VRM1 rig?] [<table> Become avatars] -> [How do we mocapture the face rig? Support mapping every single possible standard rig?] [<table> Become avatars] -> [How do we make the face rig fast? Blend shape baking to skeletals] [<table> Become avatars] -> [How do we create the standard animation set? Want to be better than the status quo of mixamo animation sets] [<table> Become avatars] -> [How do we interact with objects? Pickup animation is stored on prop] [<table> Become avatars] -> [How do we have more diverse characters? Marketplace? Proceduralism? Character generators?] [<table> Become avatars] -> [How we turn our voice to facial rig keyframes?]
[V-Sekai] - [Last changed datetime|2022-02-05T13:36+00:00]
svg.text: Players want to define the virtual worlds.
Players can't make their own virtual worlds because it is hard.
